sentences.sContent: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.sCn: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

remMethod.val: en(在…之内) + vis(看) + ion → 在内部看 → 想象

trans.tranCn: 想象， 展望， 预想
trans.tranOther: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good
